statements: SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name, points FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM player_progress ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_level, points FROM player_progress WHERE points > 100 ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT player_name, last_played_date FROM player_progress WHERE last_played_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT player_name, points FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 5 ORDER BY last_played_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, game_level, points FROM player_progress WHERE points > 1000 ORDER BY game_level ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_level, last_played_date FROM player_progress WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' OR player_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY last_played_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, game_level, points FROM player_progress WHERE points BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY points DESC, game_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE game_level = 10 OR points > 1500 ORDER BY points DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_level, coins FROM player_profile WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 AND quantity > 0;
SELECT player_name, game_level, coins FROM player_profile ORDER BY game_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_level FROM player_profile WHERE game_level >= 10 AND coins < 1000;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE is_equipped = true ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_level, coins FROM player_profile WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 AND is_equipped = true;
SELECT player_name, game_level, coins, quantity FROM player_profile JOIN player_inventory ON player_profile.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE game_level > 5;

SELECT player_profile.player_name, player_inventory.item_id, player_inventory.quantity FROM player_profile JOIN player_inventory ON player_profile.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_inventory.quantity >= 10;
SELECT player_name, coins, quantity FROM player_profile JOIN player_inventory ON player_profile.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_inventory.is_equipped = true;
SELECT player_id, game_level, experience_points FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 10
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity >= 5
SELECT player_id, games_won, games_lost FROM player_statistics WHERE games_won > games_lost
SELECT game_level, player_id, experience_points FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT games_won, player_id, games_lost FROM player_statistics WHERE games_won < games_lost
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 101;
SELECT game_level, experience_points FROM player_progress WHERE game_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE item_id = 201 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_won, games_lost FROM player_statistics WHERE games_won > games_lost;
SELECT player_id, game_level, experience_points FROM player_progress WHERE game_level < 3;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_name, game_progress FROM players WHERE game_progress > 50 ORDER BY game_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT player_name, health, experience FROM player_stats WHERE health < 100 AND experience > 500;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT player_name, health, experience FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE health > 50 AND experience < 1000;
SELECT * FROM game_levels WHERE level_difficulty BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY level_difficulty ASC, level_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_score > 1000;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'Adventure' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, points FROM players p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id WHERE a.points > 50;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players p JOIN player_inventory i ON p.player_id = i.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE game_genre = 'Adventure';
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, points FROM players INNER JOIN achievements ON players.player_id = achievements.player_id WHERE players.player_level >= 5;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id WHERE player_inventory.quantity > 0 ORDER BY player_name, quantity DESC;
